document.full_text: a new study seeks to reduce the value of one's college major to dollars and cents, and finds that the earnings of those who studied engineering far outpace those who majored in counseling and education. but is that definition of value too narrow?
document.title: what's your major worth?
lines_and_colors: a new study seeks to reduce the value of one's college major to dollars and cents, and finds that the earnings of those who studied engineering far outpace those who majored in counseling and education. but is that definition of value too narrow?
